languages.text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer makes an area attack, this attack deals additional direct damage equal to the target's deflection.

Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，此次攻击都会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者在一次攻击中至少对3名敌人造成伤害时，此次攻击无视敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, персонаж наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} цели.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals damage to three or more enemies in one attack, this attack ignores enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж наносит урон трем или более противникам за одну атаку, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} противников.
Когда персонаж наносит урон трем или более противникам за одну атаку, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} противников.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}をするたびに、追加でターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}と等しい{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が1回の攻撃で3体以上の敵にダメージを与えるたび、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador use un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g}, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} adicional igual al {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del objetivo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador cause daño a tres o más enemigos en un ataque, este ataque ignora el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de los enemigos.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} durchführt, fügt dieser Angriff zusätzlich {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} in Höhe der {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} des Ziels zu.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger drei oder mehr Feinden in einem Angriff Schaden zufügt, ignoriert dieser Angriff die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, cette attaque inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de la cible.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à au moins trois ennemis au cours d'une même attaque, cette attaque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des ennemis.
Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à au moins trois ennemis au cours d'une même attaque, cette attaque ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des ennemis.
